name: Andesite
description: Mined by Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson in Yosemite.

name: Obsidian
description: Buy 10 to go to the nether!

name: Limestone
description: Original slab of limestone used to build the pyramids.

name: Marble
description: From the head of the statue of Zeus. Don't ask how we got it..

name: Arenite
description: Sandstone. Probably formed from the weight of the pyramids.

name: Granite
description: Cheaper than marble. Use it for a counter top
